g.text: The administrator starts to register an organization.
The system asks for the requested organization data (name).
The administrator introduces the requested data.
The system validates and presents the data to the administrator and asks for confirmation.
The system asks for the requested manager and collaborator data (manager: name, email / collaborator: name, email).
The administrator introduces the requested data.
The system validates and presents the data to the administrator and asks for confirmation.
The system registers the organization with the manager and the collaborator as an user and send automatically the password by email and informs the administrator of operation's success.
